availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sylvester H. Welch (Allen County, Kentucky, saddler and merchant.)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, saddler and merchant. Allen County, Kentucky, native. Son of Payton Welch and Sarah Lyles Welch. Married to Mary W. Burton Welch in Allen County on April 25, 1853. Father of James A. Welch and Plutarch Welch. Married to Sarah Josephine Garing Welch in Allen County on December 23, 1857. Father of William T. Welch. Saddler in Scottsville, Kentucky in 1860. Employed W. D. Cain as a saddler in Allen County in 1860. Merchant in Allen County in February 1864.
